__e: I seduced you, and you let me because you knew I was safe. You knew I'd always stand by you because I'm your sister!
And my adventures in this life won't mean anything... because you will have seduced my soul... and drawn me into your world.
I have never loved another man... Since the day you seduced me and left.
It doesn't mean anything except that she was seducing young boys.
You're not like the man she loved 40 years ago.
How can I be the man she loved 40 years ago?
